page.title: 10HOLY WELL SCHOOL CONTINUED
page.content:
{HOLY WELL SCHOOL CONT.}
We visited Holy Well where we asked the Headmistress if we could ask her some questions about the school. The school was built in 1830, there are two classrooms and there are two permanent teachers and one part timer. There are thirty four children and the children get to school by: taxi, cars, and bicyles. The school catchment area includes Lake, Eastacombe and Harracott.There is no connection with the school and the{Holy Well}just outside the school grounds.The only connection with Tawstock Parish Council is one governor and the Council own the war memorial garden on the boundary of the school.
